derivation: a primitive root (identical with H6238 (עָשַׁר)); to accumulate; but used only as denominative from H6235 (עֶשֶׂר);
outline:
1. to tithe, take the tenth part of, give a tithe, take a tithe
    1. (Qal) to tithe
    2. (Piel) to give a tithe
    3. (Hiphil) to take a tithe
kjv_def: [idiom] surely, give (take) the tenth, (have, take) tithe(-ing, -s), [idiom] truly.
strongs_def: to tithe, i.e. to take or give atenth
